about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey through time and space in TEMPORAL SALVAGE, where your team of daring technicians take charge! In this idle/incremental adventure, your technicians are the stars of the show, while you are their show runner.

What to Expect With Temporal Salvage:

Clicking

Click the central terminal as fast as you can. If you seem to get bogged down or simply want to click fast, that's easy.. hire a technician to do your dirty work for you!

Upgrading

Tired of waiting for your technicians to slowly bash their brains against the terminals? Easy, just make them go faster! There are over 15+ upgrades that you can purchase in order to cultivate the perfect terminal clicking army.

Of Course... Idling

What Is An Idle / Incremental Game Without It!

Features:
    [over 15+ Upgrades]
    [7 Technician Variants]
    [a Mysterious Black Hole...]

The plot is simple. With every smack, you unlock Time points. You then spend your time points on new upgrades and discoveries, paving the way for thrilling possibilities.

Get ready to relinquish control and witness the excitement unfold as you guide your team of technicians and take the reins in TEMPORAL SALVAGE! Dive into the cosmic chaos and see where the adventure takes you. Start playing now and let the temporal journey begin!

name: TEMPORAL SALVAGE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 390x or 980
  • Storage: 70 MB available space

short_description: Embark on an epic journey through time and space in TEMPORAL SALVAGE, where your team of daring technicians take charge with a mind of their own! In this idle/incremental adventure, your technicians are the stars of the show, tirelessly smacking into the terminal to push the boundaries of reality.
